about_the_game:
About Scope 3

Scope 3 is a revolutionary application designed to assist individuals with low eyesight or vision-related issues, as well as those suffering from neck discomfort. Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive enthusiast, Scope 3 empowers users by improving their ability to view crucial areas on the screen without the need to lean in or strain. It promotes healthier posture and offers a more comfortable, efficient gaming experience for all users.

Lightweight and Fast:
Scope 3 is designed with performance in mind. It is lightweight and fast, ensuring that it doesn’t interrupt or slow down your game. The application runs smoothly in the background, allowing you to focus on your gameplay without any lag or interruptions.

Enhanced Visibility:
Scope 3 is designed to support individuals with visual impairments or low eyesight, enhancing overall comfort during gaming sessions. By providing a clearer view of the screen, Scope 3 reduces eye strain and minimizes the need to lean in closer, promoting a healthier, more relaxed gaming posture.

Disclaimer: Scope 3 performs no differently than if you were to move your head closer to the screen. It does not enhance or alter images but allows for more comfortable viewing without straining your neck or eyes.

Posture Improvement:
Scope 3 actively supports healthy gaming habits by minimizing the need to strain your neck or lean forward toward the screen. By helping you stay relaxed and focused, it promotes a better gaming posture and helps prevent long-term physical discomfort.

Customization Options:
We know that every gamer has different needs. That’s why Scope 3 offers a variety of customization features that allow you to tailor the application to your comfort level. You can adjust settings like zoom and screen focus to match your preferences, providing the best possible viewing experience for you.

Easy to Use:
Simplicity is key. Scope 3 is intuitive and easy to set up, so you can enhance your gaming experience without any complicated settings or technical barriers. Whether you’re tech-savvy or just looking for a simple tool to improve your comfort, Scope 3 is designed for everyone.

Efficient and Comfortable Gaming:
Gaming should be enjoyable, not physically taxing. Scope 3 ensures that users can game efficiently and comfortably, allowing for extended play sessions without sacrificing health or performance.

At the end of the day, gaming shouldn’t come at the cost of your health. Scope 3 helps you enjoy the games you love with ease and comfort, promoting better posture and offering visual assistance for those who need it most.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 10 MB MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires .NET Framework 4.8 or higher.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 1050 or better)
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires .NET Framework 4.8 or higher.

short_description: Scope 3 is a revolutionary app designed to assist individuals with low eyesight or neck discomfort, helping users see smaller areas in first-person shooters more clearly. It enhances visibility, supports healthy posture, and ensures efficient, comfortable gaming without compromising human health.
